title: Finding the Y-Intercept
text: We must now set $$x$$ equal to $$0$$ and then solve for f(x). This leaves us with $$\frac{7}{30}$$.

title: Finding the X-Intercept
text: We must now set f(x) equal to $$0$$ and then solve for $$x$$. $$x^2+8x+7=0$$. $$\left(x+7\right) \left(x+1\right)=0$$. This means that $$x=-7$$ and $$-1$$.
